newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products broadly steady, fuel barges up.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products broadly steady, fuel barges up.

text.p: NWE oil products were steady aside from stronger fuel oil barges.
Gasoline was flat but quiet. Eurograde barges asked $214.50 for refinery product but some $212.00 for storage material.
Naphtha was stable with Dec swaps traded at $223.25 cif NWE. The Skikda port remained closed
Gas oil was steady with many players sidelined as uncertainty over the record delivery into the November IPE gas oil contract continued.
High sulphur fuel barges rose $2 on prompt loading problems and filtering December strength. Cargoes held at $120 cif NWE
